attributes.action: Keep testing people, give information on numbers /locations of coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: We feel that we are not being told the truth, hiding numbers by not testing is causing worry and panic, feeling that we ha e been left in limbo and to get on with it,  and if theres contesting how will the government know how bad its got
attributes.background: For the government to ban mass gatherings, carry on testing and reporting cases with locations of coronavirus so the public are aware of the growing numbers of infected people within the uk and not hide the truth. Follow suit of large European countries

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
The Government has not stopped testing people or reporting numbers. We're therefore not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You can view the number of cases here: 

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public#number-of-cases
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want the Government to fund the deployment of publicly accessible testing, you may wish to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

If you want the Government to ban large gatherings, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
